scripts.server:integration: cd server && TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --debug
scripts.client: cp client/src/config/ServerUrlLocal.ts client/src/config/ServerUrl.ts && cd client && npm run-script start
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && nodemon" "cd server && authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --debug --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80"
scripts.local: concurrently "cd client && nodemon" "cd server && venv/bin/flask  run --debug"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --debug" "cd client && npm run-script test:integration"
scripts.alembic: cd server && ALEMBIC=True authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --debug --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
